/usr/bin/c++ -rdynamic CMakeFiles/device_info.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/device_info.dir/src/utils.cpp.o CMakeFiles/device_info.dir/src/matmul.gpu.cu.o -o ../bin/device_info   -L/usr/local/cuda-12.1/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-12.1/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
